title: RAFT with watsonx
author: Shilpi Varshney
description:
This asset is the watsonx-ized version of RAFT framework which used OPENAI. 
More details about RAG can be found here: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/ai-ai-platform-blog/raft-a-new-way-to-teach-llms-to-be-better-at-rag/ba-p/4084674
